about_the_game:
This is a special set that contains 3 cutting-edge aircraft.
As a bonus, it also includes 10 emblems and 13 skins.

Includes the following:
ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F/A-18F Super Hornet Block III Set
- Playable Aircraft: F/A-18F Super Hornet Block III
A modernized carrier-based fighter modeled after the F/A-18.
This aircraft can equip the LACM, 8AGM, or 4AAM as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Aggressor Splitter" skin.

ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F-2A -Super Kai- Set
- Playable Aircraft: F-2A -Super Kai-
A modernized multirole support fighter based on the F-2.
This aircraft can equip the LASM, 6AAM, or IEWS as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Tiger" skin.

ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN - MiG-35D Super Fulcrum Set
- Playable Aircraft: MiG-35D Super Fulcrum
A multirole jet fighter developed as a variant of the MiG-29.
This aircraft can equip the SAAM, 6AAM, or 4AGM as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Tiger" skin.

Bonus 1: 10 Emblems
- 4 Nugget emblems celebrating the 25th anniversary of the series
- 4 emblems from Air Combat 22, an older game in the series
- 2 emblems from other games in the series, including "Mobius 1"

Bonus 2: 13 Skins
- 13 skins from enemy squadrons in the series, including "F/A-18F General Resource Skin", "Su-57 Scarface Skin", and "ADFX-01 Glowing Red Skin"

* Skins and emblems can be changed in campaign mode after completing the mode once. In multiplayer mode, they can be changed right away.
detailed_description:
This is a special set that contains 3 cutting-edge aircraft.
As a bonus, it also includes 10 emblems and 13 skins.

Includes the following:
ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F/A-18F Super Hornet Block III Set
- Playable Aircraft: F/A-18F Super Hornet Block III
A modernized carrier-based fighter modeled after the F/A-18.
This aircraft can equip the LACM, 8AGM, or 4AAM as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Aggressor Splitter" skin.

ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F-2A -Super Kai- Set
- Playable Aircraft: F-2A -Super Kai-
A modernized multirole support fighter based on the F-2.
This aircraft can equip the LASM, 6AAM, or IEWS as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Tiger" skin.

ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN - MiG-35D Super Fulcrum Set
- Playable Aircraft: MiG-35D Super Fulcrum
A multirole jet fighter developed as a variant of the MiG-29.
This aircraft can equip the SAAM, 6AAM, or 4AGM as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Tiger" skin.

Bonus 1: 10 Emblems
- 4 Nugget emblems celebrating the 25th anniversary of the series
- 4 emblems from Air Combat 22, an older game in the series
- 2 emblems from other games in the series, including "Mobius 1"

Bonus 2: 13 Skins
- 13 skins from enemy squadrons in the series, including "F/A-18F General Resource Skin", "Su-57 Scarface Skin", and "ADFX-01 Glowing Red Skin"

* Skins and emblems can be changed in campaign mode after completing the mode once. In multiplayer mode, they can be changed right away.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card

  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card

short_description: This special set contains 3 ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN add-ons, including the F/A-18F Super Hornet Block III Set, the F-2A -Super Kai- Set, and the MiG-35D Super Fulcrum Set. As a bonus, it also includes 10 emblems and 13 skins.
